tool_description: Estimates travel times for routes considering current traffic conditions, historical patterns, and dynamic factors affecting journey duration.

traffic_conditions.description: Current traffic condition data for route segments

error_messages: Invalid route data: route_data array cannot be empty and must contain valid route information
Invalid traffic conditions: traffic_conditions array cannot be empty and must match route segments
Invalid departure time: departure_time must be a valid ISO 8601 timestamp
Invalid confidence level: confidence_level must be between 0.8 and 0.99
Data mismatch: Length of traffic_conditions must match number of route segments
usage: Input route_data, traffic_conditions, and departure_time, optionally specify confidence_level. Returns travel time estimates with confidence intervals.

confidence_interval_lower.description: Lower bound of travel time confidence interval in minutes

confidence_interval_upper.description: Upper bound of travel time confidence interval in minutes

reliability_score.description: Reliability score of the estimate from 0 to 1
